aa0c31a5-d0b9-4144-add4-c65db429ce43.description: Unity Essentials is the pathway for interested creators who are just getting started with Unity and real-time content creation. To achieve this pathway badge participants will create their first simple interactive experience with Unity. Learners who achieve the Unity Essentials Pathway badge can define real-time production, use the essentials features of the Unity Editor, navigate in 3D space, create and manage Scenes, GameObjects, Prefabs, and publish a simple Unity project.
aa0c31a5-d0b9-4144-add4-c65db429ce43.name: Unity Essentials Pathway

badge_template_activities.title: Completed all Missions and Assessments within the Unity Essentials Pathway on learn.unity.com

4da0c365-04d3-4dce-a931-471240e4caca.description: The Unity Junior Programmer Pathway validates skills and competencies to be a proficient junior programmer writing scripts in C# to create interactive experiences with the Unity Editor.
4da0c365-04d3-4dce-a931-471240e4caca.name: Unity Junior Programmer

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Mission and Assessment in the Unity Junior Programmer Pathways on Unity Learn.

15f146d6-3a05-43d0-9dc2-f1383cb05148.description: Earners of the Unity Certified Associate: Game Developer badge possess a solid understanding of end-to-end game production using Unity, spanning key concepts in both technical art and programming. These earners have the core skills required to be confident iterating with prototypes, debugging, and solving programming challenges for successful game design and coding.
15f146d6-3a05-43d0-9dc2-f1383cb05148.name: Unity Certified Associate: Game Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Unity Certified Associate: Game Developer  Courseware (recommended)
Must pass the Unity Certified Associate: Game Developer Certification Exam

e8481ed4-421a-4d15-9d74-cb8e591abdf9.description: Earners of the Unity Certified User: Programmer badge have the basic programming skills necessary to create interactivity in games, apps, AR/VR, and other experiences. Earners are able to create interactive content for industries such as gaming, entertainment, automotive, AEC, and XR.
e8481ed4-421a-4d15-9d74-cb8e591abdf9.name: Unity Certified User: Programmer

badge_template_activities.title: Expected to have at least 150 hours of Unity software use and training
Must pass the Unity Certified User: Programmer Certification Exam

0992974f-a79b-435e-8a92-ccc6ea7dd87e.description: Earners of the Unity Certified Professional: Programmer badge have the programming acumen within the context of professional software development processes to contribute to the creation and maintenance of applications built using Unity. Earners are able to solve difficult problems with code and are responsible for contributing to a broad range of potential technical tasks, including integrating art assets, coding the user interface, scripting user interactions and optimizing performance.
0992974f-a79b-435e-8a92-ccc6ea7dd87e.name: Unity Certified Professional: Programmer

badge_template_activities.title: Experience in the full software development lifecycle working from concept through completion
Must have experience in computer programming using C#
Must pass the Unity Certified Professional: Programmer Certification exam

skills.name: Programming For Scene And Environment Design

b491ea6c-bacc-4861-b3ab-b16ff7ca6b2c.description: The Unity Creative Core Pathway validates the core skills and competencies for creating immersive worlds in Unity. The Creative Core Pathway covers the essential elements of creative production, including shaders, materials, lighting, animation, VFX, cameras, post-processing effects, audio, UI, and prototyping.
b491ea6c-bacc-4861-b3ab-b16ff7ca6b2c.name: Unity Creative Core

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Missions and Assessments in the Unity Creative Core Pathway on Unity Learn.

300e719c-11ab-4485-9e02-69e221ba2c30.description: Earners of the Unity Certified Expert: Programmer badge are highly technical and logically oriented professionals who implement assets created by Technical and General 3D Artists, and add their scripts to make the Game Design Document (GDD) come to life. They are responsible for implementing the assets, participating in designing the game, creating NPCs, game mechanics, implementing the user interface, and populating the game.
300e719c-11ab-4485-9e02-69e221ba2c30.name: Unity Certified Expert: Programmer

badge_template_activities.title: Experience in video game development studio, with at least two shipped titles.
Must have experience designing immersive games and scripting/programming using C#
Must pass the Unity Gameplay Programmer Expert Certification exam

5e7a0a55-9bac-4dda-827c-15f14dc9ea7b.description: Create with VR for Educators is a course designed for educators who want to successfully teach virtual reality (VR) development with Unity. Learners who achieve this badge can recognize the potential of virtual reality and career opportunities for students, identify best practices and approaches for teaching VR development, and create their own VR project using Unity. This course is 30 hours in total and is a combination of live sessions and self-paced tutorials.
5e7a0a55-9bac-4dda-827c-15f14dc9ea7b.name: Create with VR for Educators

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in 30 hours of live and self-paced learning and completed all assessments within the Create with VR for Educators course on Unity Learn

058c98c5-49c9-4f43-9f85-fe8951aa9836.description: Earners of the Unity Certified User: Artist badge have the basic 2D and 3D artistry skills necessary to create interactivity in games, apps, AR/VR, and other experiences within Unity. Earners are able to manage the basic aspects of dealing with art assets and are familiar with the Unity art pipeline within a game or experience. They are competent in importing and working with 2D and 3D assets, placing and designing levels, and using the tools within Unity to assist in experience creation.
058c98c5-49c9-4f43-9f85-fe8951aa9836.name: Unity Certified User: Artist

badge_template_activities.title: Expected to have at least 150 hours of Unity software use and training
Must pass the Unity Certified User: Artist Certification Exam

d4d5dc89-53ab-4e28-9bf7-65ed6696a353.description: Earners of the Unity Certified Professional: Artist badge are professionals with 2-4 years experience who bring visual assets into Unity to populate the “world” of the application to execute a key part of the creative vision for the project. They contribute to a broad range of tasks in service of the application’s aesthetics, including applying materials and shaders to 3D models, setting up and managing 3D environments, configuring and controlling cameras, and lighting scenes.
d4d5dc89-53ab-4e28-9bf7-65ed6696a353.name: Unity Certified Professional: Artist

badge_template_activities.title: Practical experience in implementing 3D art and environments for video games or other real-time 3D applications built with Unity
Experience in the full software development lifecycle working from early concept through completion and experience prototyping 3D environments and application UI
Must pass the Unity Certified Professional: Artist Certification exam

aea82a03-61b9-4040-b95b-7c5f77c247e9.description: The Unity VR Development Pathway validates the skills and competencies to be a proficient junior developer creating VR experiences and working in the VR industry.
aea82a03-61b9-4040-b95b-7c5f77c247e9.name: Unity VR Development

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the missions and assessments in the Unity VR Development Pathways on Unity Learn

0a3324a1-0647-483a-a996-76cefc43761f.description: Earners of the Unity Certified User: VR Developer badge have the VR development skills necessary to design and develop VR experiences in games, apps, and other programs within Unity. Earners are able to analyze ergonomic considerations and understand the importance of scale along with key features of spatial audio in a VR project. The UCU certification is an entry-level credential that validates foundational skills in Unity and ability to create interactive, real-time 3D experiences.
0a3324a1-0647-483a-a996-76cefc43761f.name: Unity Certified User: VR Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Must pass the Unity Certified User: Programmer Certification Exam
Must pass the Unity Certified User: VR Developer Certification Exam

b75d173a-a7f1-4a30-aff8-226e1fdc7476.description: Earners of the Unity Certified Instructor badge have the core skills required to successfully train creators to build various types of interactive applications. These earners also have the combination of strong instructional skills and Unity skills for interactive development.
b75d173a-a7f1-4a30-aff8-226e1fdc7476.name: Unity Certified Instructor

badge_template_activities.title: Must have CompTIA CTT+ In-person Training Certification, active teaching credential, or equivalent

95ef38b7-a70c-460c-84e9-02e6972dcbfe.description: Unity Educator Ambassadors are passionate community leaders selected by Unity to empower other Unity Educators in an official capacity. These Ambassadors share their skills, knowledge and support to provide high quality Unity education to students of all levels.
95ef38b7-a70c-460c-84e9-02e6972dcbfe.name: Unity Education Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Ability to use Unity at a competent level. This is assessed using an application process that includes demonstration of Unity certifications/qualifications, such as: Unity Certified User: Programmer or Artist, Unity Certified Instructor, Unity Certified Associate and above, a portfolio of projects built using Unity, Unity Pathway completion badges.
Ability to effectively plan and teach high-quality learning experiences with Unity. This is assessed through an application process.

4b5f5066-01b1-47e2-bb16-732a6350b9cd.description: The Unity Mobile AR Development Pathway validates the skills and competencies to be a proficient junior developer creating Mobile AR apps compatible with iOS and Android devices.
4b5f5066-01b1-47e2-bb16-732a6350b9cd.name: Unity Mobile AR Development

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the missions and assessments, along with portfolio pieces, in the Unity Mobile AR Development pathway on Unity Learn.

6dd80208-6749-4a28-aa68-10547dd3f17d.description: Earners of the Unity Certified Expert: Technical Artist in Shading & Effects badge are skilled professionals with proven competency in shading and effects and will often work with other Technical Artists and Effects Artists to prepare or enhance prepared game assets. These earners are responsible for implementing the look, style, theme, and aesthetics of the game.
6dd80208-6749-4a28-aa68-10547dd3f17d.name: Unity Certified Expert: Technical Artist in Shading & Effects

badge_template_activities.title: Experience in video game development studio, with at least two shipped titles.
Knowledge of scripting/coding using languages such as C++, C#, or Unityscript.
Must pass the Unity Certified Expert: Technical Artist in Shading & Effects Certification exam.

dce9cdee-c981-4dee-a3d1-dae0b9617316.description: Earners of the Unity Certified Expert: Technical Artist in Rigging & Animation badge are skilled professionals with proven competency in Rigging and Animation Technical Art.They are responsible for improving the overall efficiency of the animation pipeline. These earners have demonstrated the ability to deliver assets that can be systematically integrated into a game without sacrificing artistic vision or exceeding the platform’s technical limitations.
dce9cdee-c981-4dee-a3d1-dae0b9617316.name: Unity Certified Expert: Technical Artist in Rigging & Animation

badge_template_activities.title: Experience in video game development studio, with at least two shipped titles.
Must have experience scripting/programming using C++, C#, or Unityscript
Must pass the Unity Certified Expert: Technical Artist in Rigging & Animation Certification exam
